sections.title: Recital 1
sections.content: Amendments to Directive 2009/65/EC' and 'Amendments to Directive 2011/61/EU' and 'Conditions for pre-marketing in the Union by an EU AIFM' and 'De-notification of arrangements made for the marketing of units or shares of some or all EU AIFs in the Member States other than in the home Member State of the AIFM' and 'Facilities available to retail investors' and 'Assessment of the passport regime'

sections.title: Recital 2
sections.content: Reverse repurchase agreements enable MMFs to implement their investment strategy...

sections.title: Recital 3
sections.content: Managers of MMFs should not be obliged to apply a specific adjustment to the value...

sections.title: Recital 4
sections.content: Managers of MMFs should be able to apply a higher haircut than the minimum laid down...
